resources.string: NTS PIM
SquareActivity
sandbox-sq0idp-5_XOnvUJpYLpx6JMsSgWGQ
CUSTOMIZE NEW BIKE
Point of Sale API is Disabled
Sorry, the Point of Sale API is not currently available.
The debug description of this error can be found in Logcat.
Install Point of Sale
Square Point of Sale must be installed to perform transactions. Please visit the play store to download.
Network error
The transaction failed because there is no Internet connection. Please ensure you are connected and try again.
No result from Square Point of Sale
This can happen if Square Point of Sale was uninstalled or crashed while we\'re waiting for a result.
User not activated
This Square merchant has not been activated for card processing. You can complete the transaction with cash or sign in to Point of Sale with a different account.
The Merchant has not authorized this application
User not logged in
You must be logged in to Square Point of Sale on this device to complete the transaction. Please log in and try again.
The Transaction was Cancelled
Click try again to restart the transaction.
Transaction in Progress
Please open Point of Sale and complete the transaction in progress before trying again.
Point of Sale API Encountered an Error
Open Play Store
Please try again
